column4: Is there an IRC channel for help with intel macs running linux? Preferably Ubuntu specific?
well, i think you can try this channel
intel macs running linux ubuntu specific is very spefic..
I have been trying to get help on my sleep issues with my macbook pro for days now on this channel.
sleep issues?
i think you could now try google or a ubuntu forum
It won't wake from sleep ( black screen )
I tried both of those first.
i didn't understand, you meant the screen that apeears when the desktop is idle?
When resuming from suspend
well.. ugh.. i had never used suspend, and i don't have a mac.. (i don't have a mac with intel processor too)
what about submiting a bug in launchpad? or to gnome project
I haven't done that yet, I wasn't sure if it was a bug or user error, I guess  will submit a bug now though.
if nobody can help you, there is a chance that it is a bug. but i am unsure if you can bug it in launchpad, gnome bugs must be sent to gnome's bugzilla
I also haven't tried suspend when not running X, do you know the command for suspend from the terminal?
no..
what is the command?
That is what I am trying to ask :)
you can find out the package that provides this command, it's the package that may be with a bug so..
ah! heh. (sorry, english isn't my first language..)
well, do you know HOW to suspend with gnome? i have never tried!
yes.
tell me, heh
